p: Some evidences point that the action of FQ seems to be related to inhibition of the hemozoin formation in the food vacuole of the parasite. Despite the similarity in mechanism when compared to CQ, studies indicated that FQ is more efficient than CQ to inhibit the formation of Î²-hematin. FQ and CQ showed IC50 values of 0.8 and 1.9, respectively (Biot et al. 2005).
